item.title: CVE-2024-29913|2024-03-27T07:02:45.214Z -- Themeum -- Tutor LMS Elementor Addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Tutor LMS Elementor Addons: from n/a through 2.1.3.
